link.expr:href: "//" + (data:view.featuredImage contains "blogger.googleusercontent.com" ? "blogger.googleusercontent.com" : data:view.featuredImage contains "1.bp.blogspot.com" ? "1.bp.blogspot.com" : data:view.featuredImage contains "2.bp.blogspot.com" ? "2.bp.blogspot.com" : data:view.featuredImage contains "3.bp.blogspot.com" ? "3.bp.blogspot.com" : "4.bp.blogspot.com")

b:include.data: { image: data:image, altText: data:blog.title.escaped, originalWidth: data:width, originalHeight: data:height }
b:include.name: responsiveImage

b:includable.b:comment: We don't use overflowable page list

noscript.div: To use this site properly, please enable JavaScript on your browser.

b:tag.expr:srcset: data:imgurl contains "googleusercontent.com" ? resizeImage((data:imgurl.youtubeMaxResDefaultUrl ?: data:imgurl), 480, "3:2") + "-rw-e60 480w, " + resizeImage(data:imgurl, 768, "3:2") + "-rw-e60 768w, " + resizeImage(data:imgurl, 1024, "3:2") + "-rw-e60 1024w" : sourceSet(data:imgurl, [480,768,1024], "3:2")
b:tag.name: img

b:includable.b:comment: Cap the total number of ads (widgets and inline ads).

b:with.b:comment: Filter out the featured post, but only on the homepage.

b:with.value: data:view.isHomepage ? data:posts filter (post => post.id not in data:featuredPostIds) : data:posts

b:includable.b:comment: Clear out style (needs to be a non-empty string)

b:tag.expr:srcset: data:imgurl contains "googleusercontent.com" ? resizeImage((data:imgurl.youtubeMaxResDefaultUrl ?: data:imgurl), 480, "3:2") + "-rw-e60 480w, " + resizeImage(data:imgurl, 768, "3:2") + "-rw-e60 768w, " + resizeImage(data:imgurl, 1024, "3:2") + "-rw-e60 1024w" : sourceSet(data:imgurl, [480,768,1024], "3:2")
b:tag.name: img

b:if.cond: data:widgets.FeaturedPost.any and data:i > 0 or !data:widgets.FeaturedPost.any and data:i > 1

b:with.value: data:post.body snippet { length:(data:blog.isMobileRequest ? 250 : 450), links: false, linebreaks: false, ellipsis: true }

b:if.cond: data:chros contains "<strong>" or data:chros contains "<b>" or data:chros contains "<em>" or data:chros contains "<i>"

b:includable.b:comment: We don't display labels on the home page.

b:widget.cond: data:view.isSingleItem and data:posts any (p => p.id != data:view.postId)
b:widget.title: Popular Posts of This Blog

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting:
You can place the widget you want to use here.

Blogger dashboard >> Layout >> Page Sub (Add a Gadget)

If you remove all the widgets here, the section itself will disappear.

b:includable.b:comment: Clear out style (needs to be a non-empty string)
